optionalfeature.name: Celebrated in House

otherSummary.entry: Renown 25+ with a {@book Dragonmarked House|EFA|5|Dragonmarked House Renown}

entries: When you request a favor from your house (as decribed under "{@optfeature Favored in House|EFA}"), it can take one of the following additional forms:

items: A dragonmarked member of the house casts for you a level 3 or 4 spell associated with the house's mark at no cost.
A member of the house casts for you a different spell of level 6 or lower at half the usual cost.

You gain a bodyguard for the duration of your next mission for the house (maximum of 1 week). The bodyguard—a creature with a {@variantrule Challenge Rating|XPHB} no higher than half your level (round up)—is appropriate to your house.

entries: In addition, your house stipend increases to support your Wealthy lifestyle (4 GP per day).

optionalfeature.name: Favored in House

otherSummary.entry: Renown 3+ with a {@book Dragonmarked House|EFA|5|Dragonmarked House Renown}

entries: You can request a favor from your house, which can take one of the following forms:

items: A member of the house casts for you a different spell of level 3 or lower at half the usual cost.

entries: You can request such a favor a number of times equal to your Renown Score. If your Renown Score falls below the total number of favors you have requested, a higher-ranking member of the house might call in a favor from you, sending you on a mission for house or personal business.
In addition, your house pays you a stipend that supports your Modest lifestyle (1 GP per day).

optionalfeature.name: Preeminent in House

otherSummary.entry: Renown 50+ with a {@book Dragonmarked House|EFA|5|Dragonmarked House Renown}

entries: When you request a favor from your house (as decribed under "{@optfeature Favored in House|EFA}"), it can take one of the following additional forms:

items: A dragonmarked member of the house casts for you a level 5 spell associated with the house's mark at no cost.
A member of the house casts for you a different spell of level 8 or lower at half the usual cost.

entries: In addition, your house stipend increases to support your Aristocratic lifestyle (10 GP per day).

optionalfeature.name: Recognized in House

otherSummary.entry: Renown 10+ with a {@book Dragonmarked House|EFA|5|Dragonmarked House Renown}

entries: When you request a favor from your house (as decribed under "{@optfeature Favored in House|EFA}"), it can take one of the following additional forms:

items: A dragonmarked member of the house casts for you a level 2 spell associated with the house's mark at no cost.
A member of the house casts for you a different spell of level 4 or lower at half the usual cost.

Whenever you take a Bastion turn, you can issue an order to your house as if it were a special facility in your Bastion. Your house determines the type of special facility available to you, as noted in each house's description later in this chapter.

entries: In addition, your house stipend increases to support your Comfortable lifestyle (2 GP per day).
